Project.name: Box Splash Demo for JavaScript
Project.Description: This demo illustrates a pure JavaScript / CSS application that creates a variable number of colored boxes in a 3D cloud, which rotates in the direction of your cursor movement.
Project.ReleaseNotes:
Features in Version 1.0
  • Works with both minified and standard library files.
  • It is a tangible test of a browser's JavaScript execution efficiency.
Project.Installation:
Installing the Project Source Code From the archive
  • Download the latest source code archive
  • Unzip the source code zip to any folder on your disk. For instance:
    • c:\development\
  • You will see a BoxSplash_X_Y (where X_Y is version) source folder. For instance:
c:\development\BoxSplash_X_Y From the Repository
  • Use your favorite SVN client to retrieve the latest source code release from the repository.
